verbose_text: Gabapentin may modulate itch in the dorsal root ganglion and dorsal horn of the spinal cord by inhibiting the alpha2delta subunit of voltage dependent calcium channels, thereby increasing the threshold for neuronal excitation [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Gabapentin may modulate itch in the dorsal root ganglion and dorsal horn of the spinal cord by inhibiting the alpha2delta subunit of voltage-dependent calcium
